g.aria-label: X-axis titled 'mean execution time in µs' for a linear scale with values from 0 to 220

Y-axis titled 'algorithm' for a discrete scale with 15 values: (JohT) inputPerKernelValue Transposed, (JohT) inputPerKernelValue Transposed OuterLoopUnrolled, (JohT) inputPerKernelValue Transposed Inner&OuterLoopUnrolled, (wilczek) Inner-Loop Vectorization, (JohT) inputPerKernelValue Transposed LoopFission, ending with (wilczek) Outer-Loop Vectorization
